meanings.definition: Not confidential; not meant to be kept secret or private.
meanings.sent1: The report was nonconfidential, so everyone could read it.
meanings.sent2: The nonconfidential document was available to the public.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to work on a nonconfidential project for once.
meanings.sent4: Her nonconfidential nature made her a trustworthy friend.
meanings.sent5: The nonconfidential announcement spread quickly throughout the office.
